name: Beekeeping
description:
:

Stick around in Beekeeping! Use your jumping skills to make your way through a fun 2D maze inside a beehive, gather all the precious collectibles scattered around the map and try not to die on all the spikey obstacles. Get to the end full of pollen and you will get a prize!

DEVELOPED BY: 

TEAM CRUCIO (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1 - 2017/2018)

GAME DESIGN:
Stefano Rizzo

PROGRAMMING:
Angelo Portaluri

3D ART:
Michele Gelli
Alessandro Robert

CONCEPT ART:
Matteo Facchinelli
